Sentencas: An original 3D stochastic model, based on the truncated plurigaussian random fields, has been adapted to simulate the complex microstructure of SOC electrodes.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: The representativeness of the virtual microstructures has been checked on several synchrotron X-ray and FIB-SEM tomographic reconstructions obtained on typical LSCF, LSC and Ni-YSZ electrodes.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: The validation step has been carried out by comparing numbers of electrode morphological properties as well as the phase effective diffusivities.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: This analysis has shown that the synthetic media mimic accurately the complex microstructure of typical SOC electrodes.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: The model capability to simulate different types of promising electrode architectures has also been investigated.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: It has been shown that the model is able to generate virtual electrode prepared by infiltration resulting in a uniform and continuous thin layer covering a scaffold.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: With a local thresholding depending on the position, continuous graded electrodes can be also produced.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: Finally, the model offers the possibility to introduce different correlation lengths for each phase in order to control the local topology of the interfaces.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: All these cases illustrate the model flexibility to generate various SOC microstructures.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions

Sentencas: This validated and flexible model can be used for further numerical microstructural optimizations to improve the SOC performances.
Titulo: Stochastic geometrical modeling of solid oxide cells electrodes validated on 3D reconstructions
